sentences.en: Children need physical contact with a caring adult.
sentences.cn: 儿童需要和关爱他们的大人有身体接触。

sentences.en: Consensual sexual contact between two males can be a criminal activity.
sentences.cn: 两名男性之间发生的双方自愿的性接触可能会构成犯罪。

sentences.en: Contact the Women's Alliance for further details.
sentences.cn: 请联系妇女联合会获取详情。

sentences.en: Doctors I came into contact with voiced their concern.
sentences.cn: 我接触到的医生都表示了他们的担心。

sentences.en: Does that metal pit after contact with acid?
sentences.cn: 那种金属同酸接触后是否会起凹点?

sentences.en: Everyone who came into contact with Di felt better for knowing her.
sentences.cn: 与戴妃接触过的每一个人都庆幸认识了她。

sentences.en: For a local bus timetable, contact Dyfed County Council.
sentences.cn: 若要当地公共汽车时刻表，请与达费德郡政务委员会联系。

sentences.en: For further information, please contact 414 3925, extension 2253.
For further information, please contact us on the attached form.
sentences.cn: 欲知详情，请使用所附表格联系我们。

sentences.en: For more information concerning the club contact I. Coldwell.
sentences.cn: 咨询俱乐部详情，请与I.科德维尔联系。

sentences.en: Friendship means understanding, not agreement. It means forgiveness, not forgetting.It means the memories last, even if contact is lost.
sentences.cn: 友情是理解，不是妥协；是原谅，不是遗忘。即使不联系，感情依然在。

sentences.en: Have you been able to have any kind of contact?
sentences.cn: 你联系上了吗？

sentences.en: He seemed to be in direct contact with the Boss.
sentences.cn: 他似乎直接和老板联系。

sentences.en: I came into contact with very bright Harvard and Yale students.
sentences.cn: 我接触到一些非常聪明的哈佛和耶鲁的学生。

sentences.en: Please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any queries.
sentences.cn: 你如果有任何疑问，尽管和我联系。

sentences.en: She still ached for the lost intimacy and sexual contact of marriage.
sentences.cn: 她仍旧渴望拥有婚姻中逝去的那份缱绻和肌肤之亲。

sentences.en: The exiles had been cut off from all contact with their homeland.
sentences.cn: 流亡者被切断了与家乡的所有联系。

sentences.en: The town is cut off from contact with the outside world.
sentences.cn: 小镇与外界的联系被切断了。

sentences.en: They are in twice daily radio contact with the rebel leader.
sentences.cn: 他们每天用无线电和叛军首领联系两次。

sentences.en: This morning he had tried every way possible to contact her.
sentences.cn: 他今天早晨已想尽办法与她联系。

sentences.en: When you contact these two wires, the machine will start at once.
sentences.cn: 当你使这两条导线一接触，这台机器就会立刻开始运转。

sentences.en: You must leave your full name and contact details when you phone.
sentences.cn: 打电话时须留下全名与联络信息。

phrases.tran_cn: v. 接触到；联系；开始做某事
接触（接点）电阻；瞬变电阻
联系我们；联络我们；联系方式

trans.tran_cn: 联系，联络，熟人，接触，遇见
trans.tran_en: communication with a person, organization, country etc
If you contact someone, you telephone them, write to them, or go to see them in order to tell or ask them something
communication with a person, organization, country etc
communication with a person, organization, country etc

trans.tran_cn: 与…接触， 与…取得联系
trans.tran_en: If you contact someone, you telephone them, write to them, or go to see them in order to tell or ask them something
communication with a person, organization, country etc
